item.description:
Welcome to the Monday Happy Hours series!

This event is open to all, especially those who hate Mondays and especially for those who want to check out the different bar scenes in New Haven.

This week's location is:

Foster's

There will be fabulous free appetizers provided by chef Dave Foster!
Drink Specials - To Be Announced

**09/22/2010 Update:
Specials:
$5 House Cocktails
$5 Martinis
$1 off all beers

Your contact for this event is: Robyn-Allise 203-823-5302

Come early, come late, leave early, stay late, everyone is always welcome...

P.S. As some of you may be aware, Meetup charges for the hosting of a Meetup group, which runs about $70 for six months. We'll be bringing collection jar to this happy hour, and anything you can give towards defraying the cost of paying to keep the NHC going will be greatly appreciated!
item.name: Happy Hour at Foster's
